Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.concurrent

Class LightWeightListenerList<Listener>

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.concurrent.LightWeightListenerList<Listener>
Type Parameters:
Listener - any listener type to keep in the class
public class LightWeightListenerList<Listener>
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a simple implementation of listeners repository. Listener mechanism is often used in the different classes. Most of cases require thread-safe implementation of the listener list, but thread-safe implementation must use synchronized sections to keep list consistency. This class reduces cost of the implementation by using ReentrantReadWriteLock class instead of synchronized sections. Use it for listener's lists everywhere.

This class is thread-save

Since:
0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
LastUpdate:
0.0.3

    static interface  LightWeightListenerList.LightWeightListenerCallback<Listener>
    This interface describes callback for processing every listener in the listener's list.

  • Constructor Details

    • LightWeightListenerList

      public LightWeightListenerList​(java.lang.Class<Listener> listenerClass)

      Constructor of the class

      Parameters:
      listenerClass - class of the listeners to store

    • LightWeightListenerList

      public LightWeightListenerList​(java.lang.Class<Listener> listenerClass, boolean strictImplementation)

      Constructor of the class

      Parameters:
      listenerClass - class of the listeners to store
      strictImplementation - strictly implement repository functionality. When true, implementation guarantees, that no any calls to the given listener instance will be made after returning from removeListener(Object) method. False allows some calls after returning from removeListener(Object). False is good choice in most of cases.

  • Method Details

    • addListener

      public void addListener​(Listener listener) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Add new listener to the repository

      Parameters:
      listener - listener to add. Can't be null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if listener to add is null

    • removeListener

      public void removeListener​(Listener listener) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Remove existent listener from the repository

      Parameters:
      listener - listener to remove. Can't be null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if listener to remove is null

    • clear

      public void clear()

      Remove all listeners from list

      Since:
      0.0.3

    • fireEvent

      public void fireEvent​(LightWeightListenerList.LightWeightListenerCallback<Listener> callback) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Process event for all the listeners in the repository.

      Parameters:
      callback - callback to process event. This callback will be called for every listener in the repo (order to call listeners is not predictable). Can't be null.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if callback is null
